Verses: 1 adikkadi Kadindhukollappattum Than Pidariyaik Kadinappaduththugiravan Sagaayamindri Sadidhiyil Naasamadaivaan.
2 needhimaangal Peruginaal Janangal Magizhuvaargal; Dhunmaarkkar Aalumbodho Janangal Thavippaargal.
3 gnaanaththil Piriyappadugiravan Than Thagappanai Magizhappannugiraan; Vesigalode Thondhippaanavano Aasthiyai Azhikkiraan.
4 nyaayaththinaal Raajaa Dhesaththai Nilainiruththugiraan; Paridhaanappiriyano Adhaik Kavizhkkiraan.
5 piranai Mugasthudhi Seygiravan, Avan Kaalgalukku Valaiyai Virikkiraan.
6 dhushtanudaiya Dhrogaththile Kanniyirukkiradhu; Needhimaano Paadi Magizhugiraan.
7 needhimaan Ezhaigalin Nyaayaththaik Gavaniththarigiraan; Dhunmaarkkano Adhai Ariya Virumbaan.
8 pariyaasakkaarar Pattanaththil Theekkoluththividugiraargal; Gnaanigalo Krodhaththai Vilakkugiraargal.
9 gnaani Moodanudan Vazhakkaadugaiyil, Sinandhaalum Siriththaalum Amaidhiyillai.
10 raththappiriyar Uththamanaip Pagaikiraargal; Semmaiyaanavargalo Avanudaiya Praananaik Kaappaatrugiraargal.
11 moodan Than Ullaththaiyellaam Velippaduththugiraan; Gnaaniyo Adhaip Pinnukku Adakkivaikkiraan.
12 adhipadhiyaanavan Poigalukku Sevikoduththaal, Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Yaavarum Dhunmaarkkaraavaargal.
13 thariththiranum Kodumaikkaaranum Oruvaraiyoruvar Sandhikkiraargal; Avviruvarudaiya Kangalukkum Karththar Velichchan Kodukkiraar.
14 ezhaigaludaiya Nyaayaththai Unmaiyaai Visaarikkira Raajaavin Singaasanam Endrum Nilaipetrirukkum.
15 pirambum Kadindhukolludhalum Gnaanaththaik Kodukkum; Than Ishtaththirku Vidappatta Pillaiyo Than Thaaikku Vetkaththai Undupannugiraan.
16 dhunmaarkkar Peruginaal Paavamum Perugum; Needhimaangalo Avargal Vizhuvadhaik Kaanbaargal.
17 un Maganai Sitchaisey, Avan Unakku Aarudhalseyvaan, Un Aaththumaavukku Aanandhaththaiyum Undaakkuvaan.
18 theerkkadharisanamillaadha Idaththil Janangal Seerkettuppovaargal; Vedhaththaik Kaakkiravano Baakkiyavaan.
19 adimaiyaanavan Vaarththaigalinaale Adangaan; Avaigalai Avan Arindhaalum Uththaravukodaan.
20 than Vaarththaigalil Padharugira Manushanaik Kandaayaanaal, Avanai Nambuvadhaippaarkkilum Moodanai Nambalaam.
21 oruvan Than Adimaiyai Sirupraayamudhal Ilakkaaramaaga Valarththaal, Mudivile Avan Thannaip Puththiranaagap Paaraattuvaan.
22 kobakkaaran Vazhakkaik Koluvugiraan; Moorkkan Perumpaadhagan.
23 manushanudaiya Agandhai Avanaith Thaazhththum; Manaththaazhmaiyullavano Ganamadaivaan.
24 thirudanode Pangittukkollugiravan Than Aaththumaavaip Pagaikkiraan; Saabaththai Avan Kettaalum Kaariyaththai Velippaduththamaattaan.
25 manushanukku Bayappadum Bayam Kanniyai Varuvikkum; Karththarai Nambugiravano Uyarndha Adaikkalaththile Vaikkappaduvaan.
26 aalugaiseygiravanudaiya Mugadharisanaththaith Thedugiravargal Anegar; Aanaalum Avanavanudaiya Nyaayam Karththaraale Theerum.
27 needhimaanukku Aniyaayakkaaran Aruvaruppaanavan; Sanmaarkkanum Dhunmaarkkanukku Aruvaruppaanavan.
